name: Calibration Program
objective: To provide a consistent system of physical measurement in the United States of America.
sub_agency_name: National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST)
assistance_types: Sale, Exchange, or Donation of Property or Goods

authorizations.text: 15 U.S.C. § 271 et seq., National Institute of Standards and Technology Act, as amended.

rules_regulations: National Institute of Standards and Technology Special Publication 250 "Calibration and Related Measurement Services of the National Institute of Standards and Technology, and NIST 250 appendix, "Fee Schedule"" available on the web at http://www.nist.gov/calibrations/
